    • getDouble

      public double getDouble(String config, String path, double defaultValue)
      Gets a double value from the specified configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - The name of the configuration file to retrieve the value from
      path - The path to the value within the configuration
      defaultValue - The default value to return if the path doesn't exist or the configuration can't be loaded
      Returns:
      The double value at the specified path, or the default value if not found
